english.segment1: You came to the world. For Love of one Like Me. And Though I am the worst of sinners. Grace is all I see. Freedom from these chains. My brokenness redeemed. Love and Mercy flowing down. To life eternally. How could I repay such a debt. Except with my life. How could I give anything but sacrifice. Sacrifice of praise
english.segment2: Chorus: To the King Eternal, immortal. Be all the glory forever Amen. To the King Eternal, immortal. Be all the glory forever Amen
english.segment3: In plenty and want. Your strength is all I need. And deep within these shadow lands. Your glory never leaves
english.segment4: Chorus: My Praise will go on and on and on. My Praise will go on and on and on. My Praise will go on and on
english.segment5: . Oh my Praise will go on
english.segment6: Oh my Praise will go on and on and on. My Praise will go on and on. My Praise will go on and on
english.segment7: Oh and on and on and on and on and on. And on and on and on
english.segment8: To the King eternal, immortal. Be all the glory forever Amen
english.segment9: To the King eternal, immortal. Be all the glory forever Amen
english.segment10: To the King eternal, immortal. Be all the glory forever Amen
english.segment11: To the King eternal, immortal. Be all the glory forever Amen
english.segment12: I'm giving all of me. This is my offering
